title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 838.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 838.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations

The designated waters are located in the Cattaraugus

Creek drainage basin and other drainage basins tributary to Lake Erie between

Eighteenmile Creek and Big Sister Creek drainage basins and between Big Sister

Creek and Cattaraugus Creek drainage basins as outlined in map 1, section
838.7, infra,and as contained
within the topographical limit line shown on the reproduced topographical
reference maps herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
838.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
